name: TinyTuya
description: This is a simple integration of TinyTuya to ISY994i only to Power On/Off Tuya WiFi smart bulbs/outlets.
notice: "TUYA" is trademarked., see http://www.tuya.com for more information. This Node Server is neither developed by nor endorsed by TUYA.

credits.title: polylifx: TinyTuya is a Python module to interface with Tuya WiFi smart devices.
credits.author: Fernando Flechas
